summary: Completed testing of Admin Team Tracking Dashboard feature. Backend API endpoints (/api/admin/verify-key, /api/admin/team-summary, /api/admin/user-tasks-detail) are working correctly with proper authorization. Frontend TeamTracking.jsx page loads correctly with auth screen, dashboard view, period selector (1,3,6,12 months), and exit functionality. Jira API integration requires VPN access which is not available in test environment - empty state is displayed correctly.

frontend: Login page loads with Turkish UI
Auth screen shows 'Erişim Doğrulama' with password input
Period selector shows all options (1, 3, 6, 12 months)
Exit button returns to auth screen
Empty state displayed correctly when no Jira data

critical_code_review_comments: Backend admin endpoints properly validate admin key before processing
Frontend TeamTracking.jsx has proper data-testid attributes for testing
Period selector correctly passes months parameter to API
Exit functionality properly clears auth state
Empty state and loading states are handled correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Team Tracking Dashboard feature fully tested. Backend APIs at /api/admin/verify-key, /api/admin/team-summary, /api/admin/user-tasks-detail are working. Frontend page at /team-tracking requires admin key authentication. Jira API requires VPN access - will show empty state in test environment. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_admin_team_tracking.py can be reused for regression testing.

team_summary_api.details: GET /api/admin/team-summary returns proper structure, blocks unauthorized access

user_tasks_detail_api.details: GET /api/admin/user-tasks-detail returns proper structure, blocks unauthorized access

team_tracking_auth_screen.details: Auth screen shows password input and Doğrula button with proper data-testid

team_tracking_dashboard.details: Dashboard shows Ekip Takibi Panosu with period selector, refresh, exit buttons

period_selector.details: Dropdown shows 1, 3, 6, 12 month options and triggers data reload on selection

exit_functionality.details: Exit button clears auth state and returns to auth screen

mocked_apis.jira_integration: NOT MOCKED - Real Jira API but requires VPN access. Shows empty state in test environment due to connection timeout.

env_fix_applied.issue: Frontend was using REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:8001 which caused CORS errors
env_fix_applied.fix: Removed REACT_APP_API_URL from /app/frontend/.env, now uses REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL correctly
